ygData.subject: RE: Items, Ingredients, Cost and when Trivial
ygData.msgSnippet: The Gem Cutter, once combined with diamonds, black pearls, power module and twine will create a Gnomish Ray Gun able to disintegrate most critters! Well, I
ygData.messageBody:
The Gem Cutter, once combined with diamonds, black pearls, power module and
twine will create a Gnomish Ray Gun able to disintegrate most critters!
Well, I wish... I have yet to talk to anyone who has even found diamond
dust. A few gnomish friends are even thinking of giving up the tinkering
trade; seems like the wind was taken out of them when they heard 20th Mages
will be able to create water breathing stones (with charges) making the
aqualung/rebreather a moot trade item. Sort of the last straw. But so far
the purpose of the gem cutter is anyone's guess. Maybe it's one of the
ingredients for the illusive Infrared Goggles or for an item not yet
implemented in game.

Kilkin

-----Original Message-----
From: Jason Smith [mailto:jj@...]
Sent: Monday, November 29, 1999 2:39 PM
To: EQ_Tinkering@onelist.com
Subject: RE: [EQ_Tinkering] Items, Ingredients, Cost
and when Trivial

From: "Jason Smith" <jj@...>

Anyone know the purpose of the Gem cutter?
